short_summary: Supply of blood products and insulated shipping containers to the Department of National Defence (DND)
description: Supply of blood products and insulated shipping containers to the Department of National Defence (DND) as per the terms of the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
tags: Supply of blood products and insulated shipping containers
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
